Test Mod.description: This is a test description for the mods store

Enhanced Graphics Pack.description: High-definition texture pack with improved visual effects and enhanced lighting

Difficulty Rebalance.description: Increases game difficulty with stronger enemies and reduced health items

Custom Music Pack.description: Remixed soundtrack featuring orchestral arrangements of the original music

Quality of Life Improvements.description: Various quality of life improvements including faster text, better controls, and UI enhancements

Debug Mode.description: Developer debug mode with level select, infinite health, and testing features

Speedrun Timer.description: On-screen timer and splits for speedrunning with customizable display options

Character Skin Pack.description: Collection of alternative character skins and costume variations

Randomizer.description: Randomizes item locations, enemy placements, and level layouts for replayability

Translation Pack.description: Multi-language support pack with translations for Spanish, French, German, and Italian

Boss Rush Mode.description: Fight all bosses in sequence with customizable difficulty and time attack features

Performance Optimizer.description: Optimizations for better frame rate and reduced loading times on lower-end hardware
